strategic_context.positioning_rationale: Not 'AI consultant' (too agency-forward, risky with employer). Not 'Sales leader' (too backward-looking). Not 'Product manager' (no title yet). AI-native business operator signals: thinks in systems and automation, has built real things, understands GTM/product/sales through an AI-first lens, shares how he works without selling services.
